name: Lhernand.github.io
body:
###  Leo Hernandez
* lhernand@ggc.edu


###Background
* I am a software development with an interest in business and digital media/design.  I enjoy experimenting with new things to expand my knowledge and I believe that creating ways for people to share knowledge is one of the greatest goals for mankind.  I believe that for every problem there are ten times as many solutions for that particular problem.  I find myself to be a quick learner and to be a great motivated worker.  

###Education
* Expected graduation date: 
                       December 15, 2014 from Georgia Gwinnett College
                       B.S Software Development 

###Work Experience
* I was part of a group who created an android app for the Georgia Gwinnett College community.  The app is called ggc-Connect and it is available in the play store for all of the android users.

### Skills
* Beginner software development in the Java language

###References
* tim@ggc.edu
